document.title: Blank Eiffel Graphical Application Project Wizard

paragraph.paragraph:
This wizard enables you to create a simple
0 !DefaultAssociativeIndex Eiffel Vision2>Vision2 application.
paragraph.heading: 2Navigation
paragraph.paragraph: To navigate to the desired page, select the page name which is displayed to the left hand side of the window. To cancel the wizard at any point, select the Cancel button To complete the wizard, using the current settings, select the Finish button
paragraph.heading: 2Page content
paragraph.paragraph: This wizard is comprised of the following pages:
paragraph.heading: 2Overview
paragraph.paragraph: This page displays the current settings that will be used when Finish is pressed.
paragraph.heading: 2System Settings
paragraph.paragraph: This page allows you to modify features of the main window which will be launched by the application. You may select from the following four options:

list.item: Menu Bar - If selected, a default menu bar and menus will be generated with File and Help menus.
Tool Bar - If selected, a tool bar will be inserted into the main window of the application.
Status Bar - If selected, a status bar will be inserted into the main window of the application.
About Dialog Box - If selected, an about dialog box will be included in the project. If the menu bar option is also selected, then the dialog will be connected to the Help, About menu option.
Winform Container - If selected, adds a Windows Form container.
